unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah? Heard he pulled a hamstring at the WTC final in London. Saw something about a scan on 26/06/2024. Hopefully, it's not too serious; we need him for the Asia Cup. Jadeja's shoulder been giving him trouble since the IPL final, 28/05/2024 right? Last I heard, recovery expected by 10/07/2024, fingers crossed! Get well soon, champs! India needs you! Jai Hind!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah? Heard he pulled a hamstring at the W T C final in London. Saw something about a scan on twenty sixth june two thousand and twenty four. Hopefully, it's not too serious; we need him for the Asia Cup. Jadeja's shoulder been giving him trouble since the I P L final, twenty eighth may two thousand and twenty four right? Last I heard, recovery expected by tenth july two thousand and twenty four, fingers crossed! Get well soon, champs! India needs you! Jai Hind!
